title: The Main Character Engine
subtitle: Your Life, The Movie. We Write the Script.

moodboardAI.name: Moodboard AI
moodboardAI.details: The user drops in images, TikTok links, or keywords. This AI analyzes the aesthetic and defines the core 'vibe' for the trip.

trendTracker.name: The TrendTracker
trendTracker.details: A real-time engine scraping social media for viral sounds, locations, challenges, and aesthetics. It knows what will get views.

narrativeScripter.name: Narrative Scripter (LLM)
narrativeScripter.details: The core creative AI. It takes the user's vibe and the latest trends to write a travel 'script'â€”a story-driven itinerary.

collabFinder.name: Collab Finder
collabFinder.details: Matches users with similar vibes who are traveling to the same place for potential collaborations and meetups.

locationScout.name: Location Scout AI
locationScout.details: Queries a database of geotagged social media posts to find the most photogenic cafes, views, and 'secret' spots.

bookingAgent.name: The Booking Agent
bookingAgent.details: A practical service that interfaces with legacy booking APIs to reserve the spots identified by the Location Scout.

gearAndFitService.name: Gear & Fit Service
gearAndFitService.details: Suggests and provides affiliate links for outfits, camera gear, and props that match the trip's scripted vibe.

hypeLoop.name: The Hype-Loop
hypeLoop.details: The in-app social feed where users post their content. Features challenges, trending audio, and gamified engagement metrics.

viralBoostEngine.name: Viral Boost Engine
viralBoostEngine.details: An algorithm that identifies content with high viral potential within the Hype-Loop and cross-posts it to external platforms like TikTok and Instagram.

affiliateBridge.name: Affiliate & Brand Bridge
affiliateBridge.details: Manages all monetization: affiliate links for gear/hotels, and a platform for brands to sponsor challenges or trips.

flows.description: 6. User creates content, posts to Hype-Loop
